name: Damototh
description:
"Damototh" is a Dark Souls like Action Adventure Single Player Game, made with Unity with a Third Person view in which the player plays as a fallen King, in search of reclaiming his throne.

To hope to achieve his goal, he allies himself with a quite peculiar character, Damototh, a demonic entity in the shape of a sword, who will bring him power, but might be not be as trustful as the king first thought.

This Project was my End of Degree Group Project, made by five Game Designers (including me) and five Game Artists in 4 months.
